      • initVariablesBag

        public void initVariablesBag(javafx.scene.layout.Pane battlePane,
                             javafx.scene.layout.Pane bagPane,
                             BattleLogic logic,
                             BattleController controller,
                             java.util.List<Pokemon> party,
                             Player player,
                             Item item)
        Initiates variables for opening this screen to select a Pokémon on which to use an item. This item was selected in the previous screen.
        Parameters:
        battlePane - screen from which the bag menu was initiated
        bagPane - screen from which the item was selected (previous screen to this)
        logic - BattleLogic object which handles all logic related to the battle itself
        controller - controller which handles UI changes related to the battle
        party - player party using the in battle order
        player - object that represents the player's trainer
        item - item selected in the previous screen

      • initVariablesSwitch

        public void initVariablesSwitch(javafx.scene.layout.Pane battlePane,
                                BattleLogic logic,
                                BattleController controller,
                                java.util.List<Pokemon> party,
                                boolean force,
                                Enums.SwitchContext switchContext,
                                java.util.List<Pokemon> turnPokemon,
                                Move secondMove)
        Initiates variables for opening this screen to select a Pokémon to switch into.
        Parameters:
        battlePane - screen from which the switch action is initiated
        logic - BattleLogic object which handles all logic related to the battle itself
        controller - controller which handles UI changes related to the battle
        party - player party using the in battle order
        force - if true, it doesn't allow the player to back out of the switch, this is used when the previous Pokémon has fainted or used a move that initiates a switch automatically
        switchContext - context of the switch
        turnPokemon - list of Pokémon currently taking part in the turn, ordered by attack order
        secondMove - next move to be used after the switch

      • getInfoText

        public javafx.animation.Timeline getInfoText(java.lang.String text)
        Generates an animation that sets the information text at the bottom of the screen. Makes the letters appear all at once.
        Parameters:
        text - nex text to be set
        Returns:
        Timeline object containing the requested animation

      • initPokemonInfo

        private void initPokemonInfo(boolean force)
        Sets the Pokémon information into their respective tabs.
        Parameters:
        force - true if player is forced to switch, false otherwise

      • disableBox

        private void disableBox(javafx.scene.layout.HBox pokemonBox)
        This method is called if the slot isn't filled with any Pokémon. It sets its state to empty, blocking any interaction with this box.
        Parameters:
        pokemonBox - box to which this setting is to be applied

      • setHpBar

        private void setHpBar(int hp,
                      int maxhp,
                      javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                      javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Sets the HP bar to the desired amount.
        Parameters:
        hp - value to which the bar should be set
        maxhp - maximum possible HP value
        hpBar - object representing the HP bar
        hpLabel - text label containing the numerical information about HP

      • getHpAnimation

        @NotNull
private javafx.animation.Timeline getHpAnimation(int from,
                                                           int to,
                                                           int max,
                                                           javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                                                           javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Generates animation of increasing (or decreasing) the amount of HP on the selected HP bar.
        Parameters:
        from - initial amount of HP
        to - target amount of HP
        max - maximum amount of HP
        hpBar - object representing the HP bar
        hpLabel - text label containing the numerical information about HP
        Returns:
        Timeline object containing the requested animation

                            int index)
        Fills one of the boxes with information about a Pokémon.
        Parameters:
        pokemonBox - selected box
        index - points to which of the player party Pokémon's info should be used

      • useItem

        private void useItem(Pokemon pokemon,
                     javafx.scene.layout.HBox pokemonSelectBox,
                     int index,
                     javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                     javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Method called when player selects a Pokémon after selecting an item from the bag. Checks for item type and executes appropriate method.
        Parameters:
        pokemon - target Pokémon of the item
        pokemonSelectBox - box in which te selected Pokémon's info are situated
        index - index of the selected Pokémon
        hpBar - object representing the selected Pokémon's HP bar
        hpLabel - text representing the numerical value of HP

      • initBoxElementListener

        private void initBoxElementListener(javafx.scene.layout.HBox pokemonSelectBox,
                                    Pokemon pokemon,
                                    int index,
                                    javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                                    javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Method that initiates logical and visual listeners for the selected box. Behaves differently depending on the mode in which the screen was initiated in.
        Parameters:
        pokemonSelectBox - the box whose listeners are to be initiated
        pokemon - the party member contained in the box
        index - the position in the player's party of Pokémon contained in the box
        hpBar - object representing the HP bar of this Pokémon
        hpLabel - label representing the numerical value of HP

      • checkHealingItemViable

        public static boolean checkHealingItemViable(Item item,
                                             Pokemon target)
        Checks if healing item can be used on selected Pokémon
        Parameters:
        item - selected item
        target - item target
        Returns:
        true if item can be used, false otherwise

      • calculateHealingItemEffect

        public static int calculateHealingItemEffect(Item item,
                                             Pokemon target)
        Calculates how much health is restored by using the specified item.
        Parameters:
        item - selected item
        target - item target
        Returns:
        amount of health restored

      • useHealingItem

        private void useHealingItem(Pokemon target,
                            javafx.scene.layout.HBox pokemonSelectBox,
                            int index,
                            javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                            javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Tries to use item on selected Pokémon. If item cannot be used on selected Pokémon, displays information to player and returns to Pokémon selection.
        Parameters:
        target - target of the selected item
        pokemonSelectBox - box containing information about the selected Pokémon
        index - index of the selected Pokémon in the player's party
        hpBar - object representing the Pokémon's HP bar
        hpLabel - text representing the numerical value of HP

      • checkStatusHealingItemViable

        public static boolean checkStatusHealingItemViable(Item item,
                                                   Pokemon target)
        Checks if status healing item can be used on selected target.
        Parameters:
        item - selected item
        target - item target
        Returns:
        true if item can be used, false otherwise

      • processStatusHealingEffect

        public static int processStatusHealingEffect(Item item,
                                             Pokemon target)
        Processes the effects of selected status healing item. If the item revives fainted Pokémon, it also restores HP.
        Parameters:
        item - selected item
        target - item target
        Returns:
        amount of health restored by the item, if item doesn't restore health returns 0

      • useStatusHealingItem

        private void useStatusHealingItem(Pokemon target,
                                  javafx.scene.layout.HBox pokemonSelectBox,
                                  int index,
                                  javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar hpBar,
                                  javafx.scene.control.Label hpLabel)
        Tries to use a status healing item on selected Pokémon. If item cannot be used on selected Pokémon, displays information to player and returns to Pokémon selection.
        Parameters:
        target - item target
        pokemonSelectBox - box containing the target's information
        index - index of the target in the player's party
        hpBar - object representing the HP bar of the target
        hpLabel - label representing the numerical value of target's HP.

      • returnToBattle

        private void returnToBattle(TrainerAction itemAction,
                            java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        After successfully completing the selected item action, returns to the battle screen.
        Parameters:
        itemAction - selected item represented by itemAction
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • initSwapMenuListener

                                  Pokemon pokemon,
                                  int index)
        Initiates listeners of the swap menu which appears if player presses on a Pokémon box when in swap mode.
        Parameters:
        pokemonBox - selected box
        pokemon - selected party member
        index - index of party member in player's party

      • finalizeSwitchOut

        public void finalizeSwitchOut(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine,
                              int index,
                              TrainerAction playerAction)
        Method called when finalizing switching out. Depending on the switch context, sends player to different moments of the turn.
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        index - index of the selected Pokémon
        playerAction - TrainerAction representing player choice
